```{r}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(
        lat = c(50.440328, 50.438594, 50.431827),
        lng = c(30.471775, 30.474641, 30.478971))
marks <- c("Home, sweet home",
           "Best cofee in the city",
           "<a href='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJpaDTQujMg'>School of Men</a>")

df %>%
        leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers(popup = marks) %>%
        addRectangles(lat1 = 50.451773, lng1 = 30.519521,  
                      lat2 = 50.448284, lng2 = 30.526820, 
                      label="The Heart of Kiev") %>%
        addMiniMap() %>%
        addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner)
# 50.450773, 30.521882
# 50.451347, 30.522598
# 50.450430, 30.524337
# 50.449872, 30.523548
```
